:::{#def-hessian}

#### Hessian

The matrix of second derivatives of the log-likelihood function is called
the **Hessian matrix (of the log-likelihood function)**
^[named after mathematician [Otto Hesse](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Otto_Hesse)]:


$$
\hess \eqdef \deriv{\vth}\deriv{\vth\'} \llik(\vx | \vth)
$$

:::
